sub_title: CEO CMO COO Executive board member, with 30+ years of defining and implementing vision, strategy and management teams to grow business and / or manage turnarounds for international and multi-site businesses of all sizes.
summary:
I am an international, seasoned and results driven CEO / Executive Board Director that has worked for 20+ years in the automotive industry and 10+ years in the steel industry. I operate best where entrepreneurship, ‘challenging the norm’ and ‘not being afraid to step up to the challenge’ are core to my roles. 

I speak 6 languages fluently and have excellent financial and business acumen. Having lived and worked in many parts of Europe including Germany, Spain, UK and the Netherlands, I lead end-to-end product / sales development with robust KPIs, supply chains and customer engagement to improve productivity, increase revenue / margins and build market share. I also make acquisitions and integrate businesses, review and build up suppliers and supply chain functions as well as execute lean manufacturing disciplines and strategies to drive continuous improvement across processes.

I am used to liaising extensively with government ministers / financial shareholders and building and energising high-performance teams to gain understanding and support to deliver world-class manufacturing – especially at times of great uncertainty and industry upheaval.

Specialties:
Strategy Development / Implementation ✔️ Performance Management / Turnarounds ✔️ P&L Management / Cost Reduction ✔️ Sales Management ✔️ M&A / Integration ✔️ Business Transformation / Robust KPIs ✔️ Government Relations ✔️ Supply Chain Management / Procurement ✔️ Lean Manufacturing ✔️ Collaboration / Negotiation / Contracts ✔️ Automotive / Steel Industries ✔️ OEMs ✔️ Key Influencer ✔️ Strong Communicator ✔️ Leadership and People / Team Management ✔️ Multiple Advisory Board Directorships ✔️

organizations.name: GfpM - Society of Productivity and Manufacturing in Germany
ME Saar - Metal and Electro-Technical Producers in Saarland
State’s Advisory Board for Trade & Industry (Saarland)

projects.title: M&A - Nedschroef Berlin
projects.description: Nedschroef group had been asked by major OEM to acquire loss-making family-owned fastener company in Berlin. As MD, overseeing production, supply chain and sales of similar products, led acquisition. Visited company to conduct due diligence; outlined integration strategy; and devised action plan for merging processes to improve productivity / increase output / maintain quality standards. Succeeded in increasing production more than three-fold, reducing number of FTEs by half within a few years, and celebrating newly created Nedschroef Berlin as most profitable production plant in group.

contributors.headline: CEO CMO COO Executive board member, with 30+ years of defining and implementing vision, strategy and management teams to grow business and / or manage turnarounds for international and multi-site businesses of all sizes.

projects.title: Strategy - British Steel
projects.description: British Steel had lost 1 site as result of liquidation and was suffering from overcapacity in steel and lack of rolling capacity and markets. As new CEO, needed to determine strategy to fix situation. Held intensive discussions with sales department to evaluate markets and enablers; liaised with mill managers to agree steps to increase capacities of mills; and persistently followed up with both groups to expedite delivery. Succeeded in reaching full 7 day a week production in steel making in 2 rolling mills within 1 year, with one product group becoming market leader having secured significant market share in UK construction sector.

contributors.headline: CEO CMO COO Executive board member, with 30+ years of defining and implementing vision, strategy and management teams to grow business and / or manage turnarounds for international and multi-site businesses of all sizes.

projects.title: Turnaround & Strategy - FNsteel
projects.description: FNsteel had been suffering losses for two years in a row. As new CEO, tasked with defining new strategy / plan of action. Built new management team; involved new team in developing core elements of strategy; launched strategy; implemented ‘balanced scorecard’ based indicator system to measure improvements; introduced lean manufacturing to all departments; and led by example in many projects and 5S improvements. Succeeded in delivering a good profit within a year and investing in machines / wire-processed products to increase revenue / margins further.

contributors.headline: CEO CMO COO Executive board member, with 30+ years of defining and implementing vision, strategy and management teams to grow business and / or manage turnarounds for international and multi-site businesses of all sizes.

projects.title: Turnaround British Steel NewCo
projects.description: British Steel was bought out of liquidation by China’s Jingye Group. As new CEO witnessing large losses in first month of new ownership, needed to return company to profitability as soon as possible. Liaised with new shareholders; defined plan to start by achieving zero EBITDA each month; defined FTE reduction plan; executed cost reduction plan, including insourcing many activities that had been outsourced for decades; and launched sales plan (in spite of constraints caused by Covid-19).  Succeeded in filling all rolling mills, increasing outsell prices and reporting a positive EBITDA in 1 year.

contributors.headline: CEO CMO COO Executive board member, with 30+ years of defining and implementing vision, strategy and management teams to grow business and / or manage turnarounds for international and multi-site businesses of all sizes.

profile_positions.description:
British Steel is a fully integrated steel producer with c. 4,000 employees and revenues of £1.5bn (2019).  I was asked to take on the role of CEO at the time of Chinese-owned Jingye Group’s acquisition of British Steel for £70m in March 2020. I lead the iron and steel making, rod mill and rail mill (Scunthorpe), construction beams (Teeside), special profiles (Skinningrove) and The Netherland’s based rod mill (Alblasserdam) and sales offices worldwide. I am also a Board member of Jingye UK Holding Ltd and a Board member of UK Steel Association (UK Steel), representing British Steel interests in London.

Some of my key achievements in this role include leading the plan to reduce enormous losses a month, and return a positive result which was achieved in the 12th month of new ownership, implementing a short term growth plan as well as a 10-year business plan, which resulted in a major uplift in output and profitability in 3 processing plants and determining a blueprint for managing site production during Covid-19, which resulted in HM Government’s BEIS Department sharing with the wider manufacturing industry as an example of best practice.
profile_positions.title: CEO

profile_positions.description:
I was first asked to join the Board of 3 alongside Chairman and CFO, and to lead marketing and sales for all the rolling mills of the Group: rail in UK and France, wire rod in UK and the Netherlands and construction in the UK.  These were structured into 5 business units with 5 directors and represented some 2.5m tons of production per annum. I devised a sales transformation system with robust KPIs and encouraged visits to processing plants to see first-hand how indicators were being met. I also introduced Salesforce and led a lean manufacturing process as well as dramatically increased the domestic market share of our construction products. 

In May 2019, British Steel was placed into an insolvency process, putting 4,000 jobs in the UK at risk and the Government's Official Receiver took control of company. I was requested by EY, the Special Manager appointed by the Official Receiver, to take on acting CEO role and lead the trade sale negotiations. I liaised extensively with the UK Government, most notably Secretary of State for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy (BEIS) and supported negotiations by making sales presentations to potential buyers.  I also regularly communicated with employees, trade unions and customers to keep everyone on side during period of uncertainty.
profile_positions.title: Board member - CMO

profile_positions.description: I was asked by a close industry associate to return to the Netherlands and turn around the British Steel subsidiary, FNSteel BV, a rod mill and wire processing centre, based in Alblasserdam, and improve its productivity levels, increase its client base and build market share. I returned the company to profit by restructuring the management team and sales channels as well as setting up a lean management / own production system, which significantly helped improve EBITDA. I also devised a new purchasing organisation, completely overhauled the supplier base, reduced the workforce and led the acquisition strategy.
profile_positions.title: CEO FNsteel

profile_positions.description: Norma Group is based in Maintal, Germany, is a manufacturer of clamps, connectors and complete fluid systems and a member of MDAX stock exchange. As first-ever President of EMEA, I was hired to create and set up a Board in the new Headquarters in Frankfurt and to hold responsibility for P&L in the EMEA region. As well as setting a vision and 5-year roadmap for EMEA, leading a Board of VPs and devising a regional management team, I also oversaw all product design and development, implemented new sales channels and re-organised all the European manufacturing and supply chain management and processes.
profile_positions.title: President EMEA

profile_positions.description: BOSAL’s ACPS division is a leading manufacturer of tow bars, wind stops for cabriolets, roof racks and roof bars and other accessories for OEMs, suppliers and aftermarket in Europe. I was hired as a Management Board Member / Bosal Group Board Member to lead the automotive components and protection systems (ACPS) and oversee R&D, sales, sourcing, supply chain management, finance, HR and the plants in Germany, France, Hungary, Russia, Turkey, Mexico and South Africa. I led the growth strategy, integrated the ORIS group post acquisition, moved plants to lower cost countries, implemented lean manufacturing and increased EBITDA.
profile_positions.title: Division director ACPS

profile_positions.description: Saarschmiede is an open-die forge, specialising in the manufacture of high-quality forgings of various dimensions, offering clients complete production line – from melting, forging and heat treatment through to machining on CNC-controlled equipment. I was hired to lead Quality and mechanical operations as well as six sigma and lean implementation and held responsibility for P&L and develop and control the mechanical operations departments.
profile_positions.title: Member Of The Management Board Saarschmiede
